segment.source: Deploying the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image
segment.target: Deploying the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image

segment.source: Deploying the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image
segment.target: Deploying the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image

segment.source: Deploying the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image
segment.target: Deploying the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image

segment.source: After you have created the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) file that contains the Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7 recovery image, you can deploy the DaRT recovery image throughout your enterprise so that it is available to end users and helpdesk agents.
segment.target: After you have created the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) file that contains the Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7 recovery image, you can deploy the DaRT recovery image throughout your enterprise so that it is available to end users and helpdesk agents.

segment.source: There are four supported methods that you can use to deploy the DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: There are four supported methods that you can use to deploy the DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: Burn the ISO image file to a CD or DVD
segment.target: Burn the ISO image file to a CD or DVD

segment.source: Save the contents of the ISO image file to a USB Flash Drive (UFD)
segment.target: Save the contents of the ISO image file to a USB Flash Drive (UFD)

segment.source: Extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image and deploy as a remote partition that is available to end-user computers
segment.target: Extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image and deploy as a remote partition that is available to end-user computers

segment.source: Extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image and deploy in the recovery partition of a new Windows 7 installation
segment.target: Extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image and deploy in the recovery partition of a new Windows 7 installation

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The DaRT Recovery Image Wizard only provides the option to burn a CD or DVD.
segment.target: The DaRT Recovery Image Wizard only provides the option to burn a CD or DVD.

segment.source: All other methods of saving and deploying the recovery image require additional steps that involve tools that are not included in DaRT.
segment.target: All other methods of saving and deploying the recovery image require additional steps that involve tools that are not included in DaRT.

segment.source: Some guidance and links for these other methods are provided in this section.
segment.target: Some guidance and links for these other methods are provided in this section.

segment.source: Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image Using a USB Flash Drive
segment.target: Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image Using a USB Flash Drive

segment.source: After you have finished running the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard, you can use the tool at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=218888 to copy the ISO image file to a USB flash drive (UFD).
segment.target: After you have finished running the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard, you can use the tool at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=218888 to copy the ISO image file to a USB flash drive (UFD).

segment.source: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image Using a USB Flash Drive
segment.target: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image Using a USB Flash Drive

segment.source: Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as Part of a Recovery Partition
segment.target: Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as Part of a Recovery Partition

segment.source: After you have finished running the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard and created the recovery image, you can extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image file and deploy it as a recovery partition in a Windows 7 image.
segment.target: After you have finished running the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard and created the recovery image, you can extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image file and deploy it as a recovery partition in a Windows 7 image.

segment.source: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as Part of a Recovery Partition
segment.target: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as Part of a Recovery Partition

segment.source: Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition
segment.target: Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition

segment.source: After you have finished running the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard and created the recovery image, you can extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image file and deploy it as a remote partition on the network.
segment.target: After you have finished running the DaRT Recovery Image Wizard and created the recovery image, you can extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image file and deploy it as a remote partition on the network.

segment.source: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition
segment.target: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition

segment.source: Other resources for maintaining Deploying the DaRT Recovery Image
segment.target: Other resources for maintaining Deploying the DaRT Recovery Image
